item.title: How I Met Your Mother
item.description: When Robin and Loretta's conflict escalates, Barney is caught in the middle. Meanwhile, Marshall and Daphne deal with a stowaway on their road trip, and Ted and Cassie try to enjoy a trip to a lighthouse.

shorttext.p: When Robin and Loretta's conflict escalates, Barney is caught in the middle. Meanwhile, Marshall and Daphne deal with a stowaway on their road trip, and Ted and Cassie try to enjoy a trip to a lighthouse.

item.title: Arrow
item.description: Oliver awakens to find himself Malcolm Merlyn's prisoner. He manages to escape and away with help from Digg. Malcolm accelerates his timetable as a result. Lance about her hacking activities but is interrupted by Oliver.

shorttext.p: Oliver awakens to find himself Malcolm Merlyn's prisoner. He manages to escape and away with help from Digg. Malcolm accelerates his timetable as a result. Lance about her hacking activities but is interrupted by Oliver.

item.title: Arrow
item.description: The mirakuru sends Roy into an uncontrollable rage and he unleashes on the city. Oliver realizes the mirakuru has taken over Roy completely and must figure out a way to stop him. Sara declares thatthe only way to stop him is to kill him.

shorttext.p: The mirakuru sends Roy into an uncontrollable rage and he unleashes on the city. Oliver realizes the mirakuru has taken over Roy completely and must figure out a way to stop him. Sara declares thatthe only way to stop him is to kill him.

item.title: The 100
item.description: Joy's baby daddy, Simon (Craig Ferguson), meets his son and grandson for the very first time as they pretend to be a happy family to get Wilbur into a prestigious pre-school. Melanie and Elka try to find the perfect doctor.

item.title: Justified
item.description: Raylan is threatened by a mystery man at Charles Monroe's mansion, Boyd faces a surprise temptation while trying to figure out who stole his shipment, and cousin Daryl encourages Dewey to stand up to Boyd.

shorttext.p: Raylan is threatened by a mystery man at Charles Monroe's mansion, Boyd faces a surprise temptation while trying to figure out who stole his shipment, and cousin Daryl encourages Dewey to stand up to Boyd.

item.title: The 100
item.description: Discovering that Jasper may still be alive, Clarke, Bellamy, Finn, Wells and Murphy make a pact and head out to find him. On the Ark, Abby is determined to prove Earth is habitable, and enlists a mechanic to craft an escape pod.

shorttext.p: Discovering that Jasper may still be alive, Clarke, Bellamy, Finn, Wells and Murphy make a pact and head out to find him. On the Ark, Abby is determined to prove Earth is habitable, and enlists a mechanic to craft an escape pod.

item.title: True Detective
item.description: Cohle and Martin finally get a new wind in the case and can confirm a suspect. Martin's mistress gets on with somebody else leaving him furious. Cohle's theory becomes increasingly more convincing than ever.

shorttext.p: Cohle and Martin finally get a new wind in the case and can confirm a suspect. Martin's mistress gets on with somebody else leaving him furious. Cohle's theory becomes increasingly more convincing than ever.

item.title: Manhattan
item.series: Season 2, Ep. 4: Last Reasoning of Kings
item.description: When Babbit's past comes back to haunt him, Frank clashes with Charlie to protect his mentor and seeks medical answers. The community reels after losing a member, while new security measures affect the scientists' work.

shorttext.p: Season 2, Ep. 4: Last Reasoning of Kings

When Babbit's past comes back to haunt him, Frank clashes with Charlie to protect his mentor and seeks medical answers. The community reels after losing a member, while new security measures affect the scientists' work.

item.title: Breaking Bad
item.description: Walt and Jesse try to up their game by making more of the crystal every week for Tuco. Unfortunately, some of the ingredients they need is not easy to find. Meanwhile, Skyler realizes that her sister is a shoplifter.

shorttext.p: Walt and Jesse try to up their game by making more of the crystal every week for Tuco. Unfortunately, some of the ingredients they need is not easy to find. Meanwhile, Skyler realizes that her sister is a shoplifter.

item.title: Da Vinci's Demons
item.series: Season 2, Ep. 7: The Vault of Heaven
item.description: Clarice's life is in danger. The fellowship enters the Vault of Heaven, which holds many mysteries and deceptions. Lucrezia reaches her destination, meeting someone along the way. Zoroaster and Nico plan their escape.

shorttext.p: Season 2, Ep. 7: The Vault of Heaven

Clarice's life is in danger. The fellowship enters the Vault of Heaven, which holds many mysteries and deceptions. Lucrezia reaches her destination, meeting someone along the way. Zoroaster and Nico plan their escape.

item.title: Manhattan
item.series: Season 1, Ep. 1: The One You Love
item.description: Charlie Isaacs and his family arrive in Los Alamos and attempt to navigate a community built on secrets. Frank Winter, the head of the Manhattan Project, struggles with the sacrifices he is making to help the U.S. win World War II.

shorttext.p: Season 1, Ep. 1: The One You Love

Charlie Isaacs and his family arrive in Los Alamos and attempt to navigate a community built on secrets. Frank Winter, the head of the Manhattan Project, struggles with the sacrifices he is making to help the U.S. win World War II.

item.title: The Walking Dead
item.description: As the sick are quarantined, Daryl, Tyreese, Michonne and Bob leave the prison in search of medical supplies. Rick makes a shocking discovery. Rick and Carol go to a nearby town where they find two uninfected stragglers.

shorttext.p: As the sick are quarantined, Daryl, Tyreese, Michonne and Bob leave the prison in search of medical supplies. Rick makes a shocking discovery. Rick and Carol go to a nearby town where they find two uninfected stragglers.

item.title: Hawaii Five-0
item.description: McGarrett is convinced that a psychiatrist murdered one of her patients, but will she get the last laugh? Meanwhile, Catherine discovers that an assassin is on the island and is looking for Doris McGarrett.

shorttext.p: McGarrett is convinced that a psychiatrist murdered one of her patients, but will she get the last laugh? Meanwhile, Catherine discovers that an assassin is on the island and is looking for Doris McGarrett.

item.title: Breaking Bad
item.description: After Skinny Pete gets ripped off, Walt makes Jesse go get the money. Meanwhile, Walt's cover story on how Elliott and Gretchen are paying for his medical treatment is on the verge of collapsing.

shorttext.p: After Skinny Pete gets ripped off, Walt makes Jesse go get the money. Meanwhile, Walt's cover story on how Elliott and Gretchen are paying for his medical treatment is on the verge of collapsing.

item.title: The Following
item.description: Mike Weston recognizes Roderick as one of the men who beat him up. He gets away but the FBI lock down the local sheriff's office until they figure out just who they can trust. Agent Nick Donovan orders an information blackout.

shorttext.p: Mike Weston recognizes Roderick as one of the men who beat him up. He gets away but the FBI lock down the local sheriff's office until they figure out just who they can trust. Agent Nick Donovan orders an information blackout.

item.title: Arrow
item.description: Peter Declan has been charged with murdering his wife, and only Oliver believes he's innocent. Arrow asks Laurel to look into Declan's case. Meanwhile, Walter investigates a warehouse that Moria mysteriously bought with the company's money.

shorttext.p: Peter Declan has been charged with murdering his wife, and only Oliver believes he's innocent. Arrow asks Laurel to look into Declan's case. Meanwhile, Walter investigates a warehouse that Moria mysteriously bought with the company's money.

item.title: True Blood
item.description: Sarah is captured and kept prisoner at Fangtasia. Jason and Jessica feel Violet's wrath. Lettie Mae bids farewell to Tara, witnessing what Tara wanted her to. Through Sookie, Bill is made aware of the cure, but will he accept it?

shorttext.p: Sarah is captured and kept prisoner at Fangtasia. Jason and Jessica feel Violet's wrath. Lettie Mae bids farewell to Tara, witnessing what Tara wanted her to. Through Sookie, Bill is made aware of the cure, but will he accept it?

item.title: Game of Thrones
item.description: Robb and Catelyn arrive at Riverrun for Lord Hoster Tully's funeral. Tywin names Tyrion the new Master of Coin. Arya says goodbye to Hot Pie. The Night's Watch returns to Craster's. Brianne and Jamie are taken prisoner.

shorttext.p: Robb and Catelyn arrive at Riverrun for Lord Hoster Tully's funeral. Tywin names Tyrion the new Master of Coin. Arya says goodbye to Hot Pie. The Night's Watch returns to Craster's. Brianne and Jamie are taken prisoner.

item.title: True Blood
item.description: A desperate Bill tries to ferry Warlow away from the faerie plain, but Sookie is having none of it. Meanwhile, Eric arrives at vamp camp, looking to inflict serious human damage. Bill feels the pull of Lilith's sirens.

shorttext.p: A desperate Bill tries to ferry Warlow away from the faerie plain, but Sookie is having none of it. Meanwhile, Eric arrives at vamp camp, looking to inflict serious human damage. Bill feels the pull of Lilith's sirens.

item.title: True Blood
item.description: The former King of Mississippi is taken prisoner and put in a cell at the Authority. Not quite knowing what might be in store for them on their return, Bill and Eric are happy to see that Roman welcomes them back with open arms.

shorttext.p: The former King of Mississippi is taken prisoner and put in a cell at the Authority. Not quite knowing what might be in store for them on their return, Bill and Eric are happy to see that Roman welcomes them back with open arms.

item.title: Breaking Bad
item.description: Walt's world crumbles even more when he finds out that Skyler is cheating on him. Jesse tries to set up a meeting with Gus to try and sell his own version of the blue meth. Meanwhile, Hank is growing obsessed with finding Heisenberg.

shorttext.p: Walt's world crumbles even more when he finds out that Skyler is cheating on him. Jesse tries to set up a meeting with Gus to try and sell his own version of the blue meth. Meanwhile, Hank is growing obsessed with finding Heisenberg.

item.title: Game of Thrones
item.description: Tyrion is arrested for the murder of Joffery and awaits trial. Sansa escapes King's Landing. Sam sends Gilly to Mole's Town. The Night's Watch finds themselves in a tight spot. Meereen challenges Daenerys.

shorttext.p: Tyrion is arrested for the murder of Joffery and awaits trial. Sansa escapes King's Landing. Sam sends Gilly to Mole's Town. The Night's Watch finds themselves in a tight spot. Meereen challenges Daenerys.

item.title: Shameless
item.description: When Lip quits school, Fiona makes a bargain with him to go back and get her diploma if he does. While she starts studying for the GED, Karen and Lip meet with adoption agencies.

shorttext.p: When Lip quits school, Fiona makes a bargain with him to go back and get her diploma if he does. While she starts studying for the GED, Karen and Lip meet with adoption agencies.

item.title: Orange Is the New Black
item.series: Season 2, Ep. 11: It Was the Change
item.description: The prison guards finally crack down on the inmates to stop the smuggling issue. Tensions run high as a prison power outage forces several issues to come to light; Piper finds herself compromised and is forced to think on her feet.

shorttext.p: Season 2, Ep. 11: It Was the Change

The prison guards finally crack down on the inmates to stop the smuggling issue. Tensions run high as a prison power outage forces several issues to come to light; Piper finds herself compromised and is forced to think on her feet.

item.title: Once Upon a Time
item.description: David must choose between staying with Kathryn or leaving her to be with Mary Margaret, with whom he's fallen deeply in love. Meanwhile, Prince Charming is about to encounter a life-changing event that will forever alter his destiny.

shorttext.p: David must choose between staying with Kathryn or leaving her to be with Mary Margaret, with whom he's fallen deeply in love. Meanwhile, Prince Charming is about to encounter a life-changing event that will forever alter his destiny.

item.title: The Big Bang Theory
item.description: The guys are stranded in the middle of nowhere when Leonard's car is stolen on the way to the Bakersfield Comic-Con. Back home, the girls try to figure out why the guys are so fascinated with comic books.

shorttext.p: The guys are stranded in the middle of nowhere when Leonard's car is stolen on the way to the Bakersfield Comic-Con. Back home, the girls try to figure out why the guys are so fascinated with comic books.

item.title: Under the Dome
item.description: With Big Jim and Rebecca in jail, townsfolk begin to take sides leading to violence and a death. Julia urges everyone to combine their food supplies, but it all backfires when the food storage facility at the fire station is blown up.

shorttext.p: With Big Jim and Rebecca in jail, townsfolk begin to take sides leading to violence and a death. Julia urges everyone to combine their food supplies, but it all backfires when the food storage facility at the fire station is blown up.

item.title: Falling Skies
item.description: Tom uncovers confidential intelligence about the heart of the alien operation. Meanwhile, Charleston prepares to mount an offensive against the Espheni, but a massive explosion brings the operation to a halt.

shorttext.p: Tom uncovers confidential intelligence about the heart of the alien operation. Meanwhile, Charleston prepares to mount an offensive against the Espheni, but a massive explosion brings the operation to a halt.

item.title: Agents of Shield
item.description: Dark secrets are revealed as Coulson and his team put everything on the line to stop Garrett and the forces of Hydra. Everyone tries to track down a former agent who is now stealing highly valuable information.

shorttext.p: Dark secrets are revealed as Coulson and his team put everything on the line to stop Garrett and the forces of Hydra. Everyone tries to track down a former agent who is now stealing highly valuable information.

item.title: Da Vinci's Demons
item.description: Leonardo builds an underwater suit and breaks into the Vatican through the sewer. He meets the Pope and the mysterious prisoner. Giuliano reveals the identity of spy in Rome. Later, the search for the Medici's spy intensifies.
